name: solid-rock
caption: Solid Rock

effect.short: Decreases damage taken from [super-effective]{mechanic:super-effective} moves by 1/4.
effect.full:
This Pokémon takes 0.75× as much damage from moves that are [super effective]{mechanic:super-effective} against it.

This ability functions identically to []{ability:filter}.

flavorText: Reduces the power of supereffective attacks taken.
